author: Anna Cara / AP
title: More Than 1 Million Coronavirus Tests to Be Rolled out in African Countries as Continent Braces for Pandemic
description: Over 1 million coronavirus tests will be rolled out starting next week in Africa to address the “big gap” in assessing the true number of cases on the continent.
content: (JOHANNESBURG) — More than 1 million coronavirus tests will be rolled out starting next week in Africa to address the “big gap” in assessing the true number of cases on the continent, the head of the African Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Thu… [+3777 chars]
